about_the_game:
Survive and struggle alone, or grow a faction to dominate. Become a quick moving silent solo assassin or a group of travelling nomadic misfits. However you decide to play, you can choose your own adventure as explorers, seeking out the most valuable loot. Or swap your hand to a quiet craftsmith selling their wares. If you need more action you can take up bounty hunting or seek the most valuable resources from the most fierce monstrosities.



Effect the living world by completing projects for faction leaders, or turn against them and overthrow faction leaders seeing the inhabitants of the lands changing as you progress.



License To Clone is a wild west science fantasy (aka weird west) RPG with a populace made up of factory bred clones, including the player themselves.

Find yourself struggling against the world, first finding food and crafting some survival items. With time you will learn the lands, find new allies and learn to thrive on this forsaken planet.

A living world of factions, wildlife all taking place on a huge open map. Create your base or forward operations almost anywhere and travel vast distances with your party, or use vehicles and other creates to get around faster.



Features

- Difficult solo survival experience or recruit allies to help
- Craft over 50 items for survival, war, medical, traps, hacking and much more
- Build your own towns and cities
- Buy and sell in the simulated economy
- Recruit multiple allies that you can command
- Complete quests which change the world
- Complete difficult bounties for cash rewards, or turn them to your side
- Fight or join factions to further shape the landscape
- Perform operations to improve or create new clone life
- Re-playable in weird and new ways, as creatures, robots and more



The world you find yourself in already has a lot of history that has taken place and influenced the world you exist in today. The planet was colonized by the Sincorp organisation 100 years ago with but a handful of humans known as "founders" their robot assistants and the technology to clone a workforce to build a new utopia.

Many factions have formed and changed over the years with leaders being formed and starting their own revolutions on the planet. The three main factions are Sincorp, FTC and Yamakai and many other minor factions also inhabit the desert lands.



As you defeat bounties, sell more items in towns and complete quests - you will see the world around you changing. From the enemies which spawn or the inhabitants of a town, the world is living and breathing.



Build and maintain your own cloning facility to find obscure mutations and put them to use in your supply chain.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains cartoon violence where the player is able to attack other humanoids, robots and fantasy animals. The game will display pools of blood around the characters although this can be disabled in the settings menu.

name: License To Clone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4160 (dual-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 440 (1 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 6570 (1 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7750 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Survive a harsh desert with sci fi technology, rampant wild clones and multiple factions. Start off working in a small town for any faction, grow your money and eventually start your own town, complete bounties to earn faster cash and progress.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
